Name: VR Racing on Dinosaur Island
About the game: Do you want to experience the acceleration? This is a VR leisure racing racing game. The game played a racing competition from the first -person perspective of the player. There are a variety of tracks in the game for players to choose from to satisfy the user's personal hobbies. Be careful to control your racing speed. Be careful not to collide with other cars, and try not to deviate from the track, then you may not be able to catch up with the racing cars in front! Racing control The right handle trigger button of the accelerator Turn to the left handle left/right button Brake right handle grip key Paralysis menu key
